Container.Name: toonamiaftermath
Container.Overview: xTeVe is a M3U Proxy for Plex DVR and Emby Live TV. [br][br][span][/span]
Container.Description:
This is a EPG and m3u scraper for the popular Toonami Aftermath channel so that it can integrate into Emby and Plex through the popular xTeVe project.
Toonami Aftermath is a Toonami revival effort, which began as a 24/7 stream, launched on January 18, 2010 with its website appearing a few months after that. It airs programs that have been broadcast on Toonami, and also Cartoon Network, Fox, and Kids WB, such as Ronin Warriors, Cartoon Cartoons, X-Men: The Animated Series, and Pokemon. [br][br][span][/span]

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: This is where the application stores its configuration, log and any files needing persistency.<br>Container path: /config

Config.Name: xTeVe Port
Config.Description: This must match the port you map to the container so that xteve can correctly forward the stream.

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: ID of the user the application runs as.

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: ID of the group the application runs as.

Config.Name: WEB Port for GUI
Config.Description: Port used to access the application's GUI via the web interface. - Both MUST match the XTEVE_PORT variable.
